channel.title: Zibez Free to play online adventure Game
channel.description:
☠ [b]Welcome to Zibez Development[/b] ☠
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/358sx06.jpg[/img]
Zibez was created on 17/12/09 and the plan was basically to bring back old runescape but in free to play mode to keep it really cool with skills and the [f2p] quests also perfect wilderness for extreme pking.
[b]The Development Team[/b] Shardyboy
[b]-17/12/09-[/b] Cleaned up the client.java
[b]-18/12/09-[/b] Start on wilderness Added danger sign Wilderness levels complete correct npc's
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/14o6n4n.jpg[/img]
[b]-19/12/09-[/b] Started Training and Magic Teleports complete full magic system free spells only magic NPC and PVP dummie training
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/68xbb7.jpg[/img]
[b]Start on skills[/b] Woodcutt - 100% Fletching - 100% Fishing - 100%
[b]Woodcutt[/b] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2mnkqog.jpg[/img]
[b]Fletching[/b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rh33lt.jpg[/img]
[b]Fishing[/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/a0aujn.jpg[/img]
[b]-20-12-09-[/b] Started Shops Completed Banking Also With Withdraw X [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/r0tfrd.jpg[/img]
[b]Banking[/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ry0mu0.jpg[/img]
[b]Zibez Development[/b] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zolv2d.jpg[/img]

item.title: Zibez Free to play online adventure Game
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Bringing back old RuneScape? You’ll be on of those people who fail at such a project; coding RuneScape is impossible.

I’m glad you bring confidence to shardyboy’s project.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 06:04:16 pm[/size][hr]By the way.

Why is it a HD picture or banner of the server…

And a 317 server

Read full topic

item.title: Zibez Free to play online adventure Game
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“ashley001, post:4, topic:320447”]Good look mate.
Like Rixxx said it will be impossible maybe in years to come it will be possible?
Who knows?

Thanks
–Ashley001[/quote]

shut up

Read full topic
item.source: Zibez Free to play online adventure Game

item.title: Zibez Free to play online adventure Game
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:5, topic:320447”][quote author=ashley001 link=topic=416925.msg3065989#msg3065989 date=1261232454]
Good look mate.
Like Rixxx said it will be impossible maybe in years to come it will be possible?
Who knows?

Thanks
–Ashley001
[/quote]

Years? RuneScape would have received major updates by ‘years’.

Bringing back old RuneScape? You’ll be on of those people who fail at such a project; coding RuneScape is impossible.

Its possible but just hard since most server bases right now couldn’t hold shit unless you started fresh or used Hyperion.

We have already got nearly 100% pvp, pvnpc, npcvnpc, etc., nearly every skill is almost 100% created to fit with RuneScape’s, on a few servers the select few that are programed well ubove what most servers here use have the stability, We have an economy also just as good as RuneScape, we almost everything RuneScape has for our resources it’s just that most people don’t know were to find all of the resources and get the help needed to complete a 100% a like RuneScape server. But like I said it will be very hard but possible[/quote]

Old RuneScape? Well good luck on that but I still strongly feel it’s impossible.

Read full topic

[quote=“ashley001, post:4, topic:320447”]Good look mate.
Like Rixxx said it will be impossible maybe in years to come it will be possible?
Who knows?

Thanks
–Ashley001[/quote][quote=“Rixxx, post:1, topic:320467”]Bringing back old RuneScape? You’ll be on of those people who fail at such a project; coding RuneScape is impossible.[/quote]

Its possible but just hard since most server bases right now couldn’t hold shit unless you started fresh or used Hyperion.

We have already got nearly 100% pvp, pvnpc, npcvnpc, etc., nearly every skill is almost 100% created to fit with RuneScape’s, on a few servers the select few that are programed well ubove what most servers here use have the stability, We have an economy also just as good as RuneScape, we almost everything RuneScape has for our resources it’s just that most people don’t know were to find all of the resources and get the help needed to complete a 100% a like RuneScape server. But like I said it will be very hard but possible

Zibez was created on 17/12/09 and the plan was basically to bring back old runescape but in free to play mode to keep it really cool with skills and the [f2p] quests also perfect wilderness for extreme pking.
